attributes.title: very ugly orange man
attributes.review: so i started my day by downloading this app, hoping to make america great! but as soon as i opened it, i was bombarded with pictures of this very ugly man, if you could even call him one. i think he resembled more of an orange if you ask me, but that’s not the point. this abomination of a human being started randomly spewing racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, white supremicist ideas around. after i quickly searched for something that didn’t sound like an uneducated 10 year old said it, i could not find anything! it’s almost as if he was trying to brainwash me into thinking his orange complexion looked good, and that his ideas were not making this country worse day by day! of course, i want america to be great, and this app said that it would happen if only i kept on looking at the propaganda written. as i looked on at what he has said and done, i started to wonder how people supported him! i did some intense digging and i found something that you’ll never believe. apparently, when trump was born in 1856, there was a spell placed upon him at birth. this was placed by a magical fairy that thought his family was a load of idiots. this curse stated that he would act like a complete moron for his life, and those that had moral issues would fall under his spell! no wonder he has so many supporters! they are under his spell of idiocy! after writing this, i plan to delete the app and forget this happened. i am lucky that i am not morally challenged like his lackeys. please keep spreading the word! this needs to be known.
